posalIndex","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"name":"proposer","type":"address"},{"indexed":false,"name":"title","type":"string"},{"indexed":false,"name":"documentationAddress","type":"bytes32"},{"indexed":false,"name":"isProposalOrApplication","type":"bool"}],"name":"SubmittedProposal","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":false,"name":"proposalIndex","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"name":"confirmation","type":"bool"}],"name":"ConfirmedApplication","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":false,"name":"proposalIndex","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"name":"voter","type":"address"},{"indexed":false,"name":"vote","type":"uint8"}],"name":"SubmittedVote","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":false,"name":"proposalIndex","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"name":"didPass","type":"bool"}],"name":"ProcessedProposal","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":false,"name":"applicant","type":"address"},{"indexed":false,"name":"sharesMinted","type":"uint256"}],"name":"MemberJoinedGuild","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":false,"name":"applicant","type":"address"},{"indexed":false,"name":"sharesRequested","type":"uint256"}],"name":"MemberReceivedNewShares","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":false,"name":"applicant","type":"address"},{"indexed":false,"name":"noVotes","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"name":"yesVotes","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"name":"totalVotes","type":"uint256"}],"name":"MemberApplicationFailed","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[],"name":"ExternalFundGuild","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[],"name":"ExternalFundProposal","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[],"name":"RageQuit","type":"event"}],"devdoc":{"methods":{"confirmApplication(uint256,bool)":{"params":{"_proposalIndex":"The index/ID of the proposal to vote on","confirmation":"If confirms or not (true of false)"}},"constructor":{"params":{"_globalDilutionBound":"The number that prohibits extreme dilution of remaining members after a massive coordinated ragequit","_globalMajority":"The majority percentage that is requirement for Yes votes to pass","_globalProcessingReward":"The number that sets the reward value when a member processes an ended proposal","_globalProposalDeposit":"The number that sets the required deposit upon proposal submission","_globalQuorum":"The quorum percentage required for a vote to pass","_globalRagequitPeriod":"The number which sets the ragequit period in seconds","_globalVotingPeriod":"The number which sets the voting period in seconds","_initialSharesRequested":"The number of the shares the summoner receives when summoning the DAO"}},"externalFundDAO()":{"details":"not implemented yet"},"externalFundProposal(uint256)":{"details":"not implemented yet"},"processProposal(uint256)":{"details":"If proposal fails need to transfer back external contributions","params":{"_proposalIndex":"The index/ID of the proposal to process"}},"rageQuit()":{"details":"not implemented yet"},"submitProposal(bool,address,string,bytes32,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_applicant":"The address of the applying member","_documentationAddress":"Hash address for the detailed documentation of the proposal","_fundingGoal":"Funds required by the proposer to realize the research proposal","_isProposalOrApplication":"Acts as a switch for deciding the proposal type: proposal for research OR proposal for new member application","_sharesRequested":"New shares minted for the applying member","_title":"The title of the submitted proposal"}},"submitVote(uint256,uint8)":{"params":{"_proposalIndex":"The index/ID of the proposal to vote on","_uint8vote":"The vote - 0: Null, 1: Yes, 2: No"}}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"confirmApplication(uint256,bool)":{"notice":"confirmApplication function to allow applicant confirm his application proposal"},"constructor":"Constructor function for summoning the DAO","externalFundDAO()":{"notice":"Allows external contributors to fund the guild bank generally"},"externalFundProposal(uint256)":{"notice":"Allows external contributors to fund a particular proposal"},"processProposal(uint256)":{"notice":"processProposal processes an ended proposal and executes the proposed subject"},"rageQuit()":{"notice":"Allows guild members to quit the guild if a voting would draw undesired outcome for them"},"submitProposal(bool,address,string,bytes32,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"submitProposal function creates a new proposal submitted by an existing member"},"submitVote(uint256,uint8)":{"notice":"submitVote function to cast a vote on a given proposal"}}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/Users/adr/Documents/GitHub/Bootcamp_FinalProject/Consensys-Bootcamp-Final-Project-researchDAO/contracts/researchDAO.sol":"researchDAO"},"evmVersion":"byzantium","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/Users/adr/Documents/GitHub/Bootcamp_FinalProject/Consensys-Bootcamp-Final-Project-researchDAO/contracts/OpenZeppelin/SafeMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf569fc2f5b2aeab257caf413966746a267fe7e478e3226ae877d249de77b91c6","urls":["bzzr://10615c37e61357ee71ecde7ea9a688e770a88fee20cfddfc9bce43203e971b32"]},"/Users/adr/Documents/GitHub/Bootcamp_FinalProject/Consensys-Bootcamp-Final-Project-researchDAO/contracts/researchDAO.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe2af68a251e08d5255f2f9c45e86e1f31bebcdf553166afd55e3c7b784d84733","urls":["bzzr://7f9a693f345aec7340812bee2b396f585dd1e4db05eeb787aa76879dd74bf6e3"]}},"version":1}

nodes.documentation:
@notice Allows guild members to quit the guild if a voting would draw undesired outcome for them
 @dev not implemented yet
nodes.name: rageQuit

nodes.documentation:
@notice Allows external contributors to fund a particular proposal
 @dev not implemented yet
nodes.name: externalFundProposal

nodes.documentation:
@notice Allows external contributors to fund the guild bank generally
 @dev not implemented yet
nodes.name: externalFundDAO

params._proposalIndex: The index/ID of the proposal to vote on
params.confirmation: If confirms or not (true of false)

params._globalDilutionBound: The number that prohibits extreme dilution of remaining members after a massive coordinated ragequit
params._globalMajority: The majority percentage that is requirement for Yes votes to pass
params._globalProcessingReward: The number that sets the reward value when a member processes an ended proposal
params._globalProposalDeposit: The number that sets the required deposit upon proposal submission
params._globalQuorum: The quorum percentage required for a vote to pass
params._globalRagequitPeriod: The number which sets the ragequit period in seconds
params._globalVotingPeriod: The number which sets the voting period in seconds
params._initialSharesRequested: The number of the shares the summoner receives when summoning the DAO

processProposal(uint256).details: If proposal fails need to transfer back external contributions

params._proposalIndex: The index/ID of the proposal to process

params._applicant: The address of the applying member
params._documentationAddress: Hash address for the detailed documentation of the proposal
params._fundingGoal: Funds required by the proposer to realize the research proposal
params._isProposalOrApplication: Acts as a switch for deciding the proposal type: proposal for research OR proposal for new member application
params._sharesRequested: New shares minted for the applying member
params._title: The title of the submitted proposal

params._proposalIndex: The index/ID of the proposal to vote on

confirmApplication(uint256,bool).notice: confirmApplication function to allow applicant confirm his application proposal

methods.constructor: Constructor function for summoning the DAO

externalFundDAO().notice: Allows external contributors to fund the guild bank generally

externalFundProposal(uint256).notice: Allows external contributors to fund a particular proposal

processProposal(uint256).notice: processProposal processes an ended proposal and executes the proposed subject

rageQuit().notice: Allows guild members to quit the guild if a voting would draw undesired outcome for them

submitProposal(bool,address,string,bytes.notice: submitProposal function creates a new proposal submitted by an existing member

submitVote(uint256,uint8).notice: submitVote function to cast a vote on a given proposal
